p: Dicoma anomala is a perennial herb that is widely distributed in Sub-Saharan Africa. Its aerial parts have been analyzed for the presence of phytochemical compounds [ 15]. D. anomala has been studied for its pharmacological potential in the treatment of various diseases. D. anomala extracts are reported for their antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, antiviral, antioxidant, anticancer, and antiplasmodial properties [ 58].
